segments.text: I see the water just gushing out of the sink, and the woman doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying that plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so bold, climbing up to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's going to fall if he's not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, not helping at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they think they won't get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around and sees what's happening soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, making such a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this kitchen is about to become a disaster zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, it's a shame the inside is so chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR
